meanings.definition: The act of giving someone the right to do something
meanings.sent1: She granted him permissions to access the file.
meanings.sent2: Make sure you have the necessary permissions to enter the building.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think it had permissions to open the door.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like permissions granted, opening up a world of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is having the right permissions in place.

meanings.definition: The state of being allowed to do something
meanings.sent1: The permissions were clearly outlined in the contract.
meanings.sent2: Without proper permissions, you cannot proceed with the installation.
meanings.sent3: The tree had permissions to sway in the wind all day long.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence gave her the permissions to take on any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of freedom comes with having the necessary permissions.
